catalog_script_client.name: Amount Calculation

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Order AI Devices">bae8dd97c3582a106314d7ec0501314f</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d2ba595bc3582a106314d7ec05013129</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Amount Calculation</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
    g_form.getReference('choose_your_ai_device', callBack);

    function callBack(check) {
        var price = check.u_price_2;
        g_form.setValue('total_amount', price * parseInt(newValue));
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-03-20 17:34:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>522e2117c3d82a106314d7ec050131bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Amount Calculation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AI Worksite Manager" source="x_1425035_ai_works">012217e2c39466106314d7ec0501310a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI Worksite Manager">012217e2c39466106314d7ec0501310a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_522e2117c3d82a106314d7ec050131bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-03-20 17:35:53</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
